类 GridView

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GridView
extends View
    This class defines the GridView, the main grid which is displayed on the view.
    版本:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    作者:
    JeanRaymondDaher
    另请参阅:
    GridViewCell, 序列化表格

      • suggestedSize

        public java.awt.Dimension suggestedSize()
        This method will return the suggested width by taking the number of columns and multiplying it by the cell's width AND the suggested height by taking the number of rows and multiplying it by the cell's height
        返回:
        Dimension Object containing (width and height)

      • addCell

        public void addCell(GridViewCell cell,
                    GridPoint point)
        Add a cell to the cells[row][column].
        参数:
        cell - Defines the cell that needs to be added
        point - Defines the location where the cell should reside

      • getCell

        public GridViewCell getCell(GridPoint point)
        Returns the cell in the current location
        参数:
        row - The Row of the cell that is returned
        column - The Column of the cell that is returned
        返回:
        Cell The Cell object returned

      • removeCell

        public void removeCell(GridViewCell cell)
        Method removeCell.
        参数:
        cell - The cell needs to be removed

      • replaceCell

        public void replaceCell(GridViewCell cell,
                        GridViewCell newCell)
        Loop through all the cells and replace the appropriate cell.
        参数:
        cell - The cell that needs to be replaced
        newCell - The new cell that needs to be added
